page.title: 02Shopping
page.content: There are many places to shop at around this area.We did a survey of where people shopped.We found out that most families shopped in Werrington.In Werrington there is a Rainbow 3 this is one of the three Co op's in this area.Altogether 42% of the people shopped there,32% of the people shopped in Sainsburys.This is a store in Bretton.The third most popular was another one of the Co op's it was Rainbow 1.16% of the families shopped here,this shop is in Market Deeping.The next two shops which are in Peterborough both had 5% of the people shopping there,these two shops are Waitrose which is in Queensgate and Tesco's which is in another part of the town.Some peoples mothers do not shop in one big centre they sometimes shop in smaller shopsin the village.4% of the people did this.
